review_title: Be a part of something meaningful
cons: More in terms of the nature of fundraising door-to-door or face-to-face model which could potentially extremely tiring for the health and well-being.

job_title: Resettlement Case Manager in Pretoria, Gauteng
pros: There are no pros to this
cons: You really shouldnt force people to do this simply by visiting your site looking fir something else. This would have been a much more pleasant experience if I was choosing to share information instead of being forced to get to what I really came to the site to do.
